short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly query software package sites for libraries & dependencies such as NPM, PyPi and Maven Central directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast query your most used software package sites, such as Maven Central, PyPi, RubyGems, and NPMJS directly from your browser. The exact sources can be configured through the settings page.
